title: Why isn't it illegal to have someone write college essays for you? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Fundamentally, it’s not illegal because nobody’s bothered to make it illegal. Governments don’t tend to care enough about the internal workings of universities to mandate academic honesty in that regard. They assume that students are aware of the difference between “my own work” and “something someone else did for me.”

Because the state has no interest in whether or not you contracted with someone to fake your homework as part of an ongoing contract you have with an educational institution to trade your money for their permission to access their knowledge resources. The school, however, is free to sanction you in any number of ways, which you agreed to when you enrolled.
